channel.title: Algorithms on Christopher Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithms on Christopher Smith

item.title: 01 Hello World
item.description: It is 1972. At the same time the world has been rocketed into the space age, another just as imporant war is brewing in universities and telecommunications companies. The Space Race didn’t just bring us closer to the heavens, it revolutionized our ability to do calculations. We needed a way to make smaller our computers, small enough to fit them into a whole spacecraft. Computers already existed, yes, but they were large, unweildy, and expensive things.
